about.me: Just a random guy somewhere in the world
about.server: To keep BCool ADA Pool's services running securely, we have developed a fully resilient, scalable and highly-secure cloud based platform which operates globally to ensure maximum rewards for your ADA stakes. Three servers spread around the world with at least 100GB SSD Disk and 8 to 16 GB of memory each!
about.company: We are a group of professionals, of friends who joined to work togheter and be part of this amazing project.
